name: Spirit Visage
passive: Boundless Vitality: Increases all healing and shielding received by 25%.
description: Item that provides Health, Magic Resist, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Increases all healing and shielding received by 25%.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy magic damage compositions
The resistances help you survive longer in team fights
Provides unique utility that can change fight dynamics
The active/passive effect creates opportunities for your team
